projects.name: PacMen
projects.description:
An unlimited number of animated PacMen chase each other around the window.
Uses the DOM and arrays to iterate through all objects created by the user, updating positions and identifying when each image is about to exceed the space of the window.

projects.name: Eyes
projects.description: A pair of eyes track the mouse pointer around your screen.

projects.name: Real-Time Bus Tracker
projects.description: Shows the position of trains on Boston's Red Line T

projects.name: Slider Puzzle
projects.description: A puzzle game to construct an image from shuffled tiles. Uses arrow key controls.

projects.name: Formik Form
projects.description: Form validation demonstration using Formik toolchain. Requires email and user 'name' to include symbols @ and . Shows error data on each line for any errors in the data provided.

projects.name: Towers of Hanoi
projects.description: Recursive programming demo to solve the classic Towers of Hanoi problem. Moves n'rings' from tower 1 to tower 3 and provides step-by-step logging of the actions taken.
